thread.title: Tech firms respond as drivers negotiate for higher wages
thread.title_full: Tech firms respond as drivers negotiate for higher wages - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Wendy Lee
title: Tech firms respond as drivers negotiate for higher wages
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle Shortly before 2am, a PayPal bus driver sleeps in his vehicle on a dead end street in San Jose, Calif., on Wednesday, Aug. 19, 2015. Shortly before 2am, a PayPal bus driver sleeps in his vehicle on a...
Tech bus drivers who are struggling financially will need to wait longer for a raise, but at least a couple of additional companies are now offering support. Shortly before 2am, a PayPal bus driver sleeps in his vehicle on a dead end street in San Jose, Calif., on Wednesday, Aug. 19, 2015. Shortly before 2am, a PayPal bus driver sleeps in his vehicle on a...
